titleStmt.title: True newes from Ireland, sent in a letter to a friend at the Meare-maide in Cheap-side.
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Robert, with the Army at Dublin.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for I. Bull living in Grubstreet,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at bottom of text: Your loving friend, Robert Fletcher. From Dublin Castle the 28. of March. 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
